intro.speaker: Nah
intro.line: All right, Nah... You can do this.You're strong! You're brave! You... EEEEEEK! Ha ha...haaaaa... Just a statue. Nothing to be afraid of...

intro.speaker: Nah
intro.line: AAAAAH! What the heck is that?!  *Huff, huff* ...Wait a minute, this is silly. I can turn into a dragon... What am I worried about? Now how do I get out of this wretched place?

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Did anyone else hear a girl scream? Come on, Shepherds! Hurry!

recruit-talk.speaker: Nah
recruit-talk.line: Eeeeeek!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Wait! I'm a friend! We're here to help.

recruit-talk.speaker: Nah
recruit-talk.line: Whew, good thing you spoke up there... I was about to melt you with my breath.

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Huh? Your breath seems fine to me...? ...Oh. I get it. You're a manakete. So perhaps you'd like to tell me your name?

recruit-talk.speaker: Nah
recruit-talk.line: Nah.

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Look, if I somehow offended you, I apologize. But you could at least-

recruit-talk.speaker: Nah
recruit-talk.line: No, NAH. N-A-H. That's my name. Ugh, why does this always happen...

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Er, right. Let's discuss it later, okay? For now, just stay behind me.

recruit-talk.speaker: Nah
recruit-talk.line: Behind you? I can turn into a dragon, you know. I'm pretty strong.

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Dragonkin or no, you're still a child, and I won't have you taking unnecessary risks. Now let's get you out of here.

recruit-talk.speaker: Nah
recruit-talk.line: Stern, aren't you? Fair enough. I like your attitude. Lead the way, sir. I'm right behind you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Nowi
recruit-talk.line: Ooh, you're the little girl we're looking for!

recruit-talk.speaker: Nah
recruit-talk.line: It takes one to know one...

recruit-talk.speaker: Nowi
recruit-talk.line: Ha-hah! It may look that way, but I'm actually quite old. I'm a dragonkin!

recruit-talk.speaker: Nah
recruit-talk.line: Oh? Well so am I, actua- Wait, are you Nowi?

recruit-talk.speaker: Nowi
recruit-talk.line: Wow, nice guess!

recruit-talk.speaker: Nah
recruit-talk.line: It IS you!

recruit-talk.speaker: Nowi
recruit-talk.line: All right, I've told you my name. Now you tell me yours.

recruit-talk.speaker: Nah
recruit-talk.line: Nah.

recruit-talk.speaker: Nowi
recruit-talk.line: Oh, come on, why not?!

recruit-talk.speaker: Nah
recruit-talk.line: No, NAH. N-A-H. That's my name.

recruit-talk.speaker: Nowi
recruit-talk.line: That's a confusing name...

recruit-talk.speaker: Nah
recruit-talk.line: And whose fault is that?!

recruit-talk.speaker: Nowi
recruit-talk.line: How the heck should I know? Anyway, this place isn't safe. Let's get you out of here!

recruit-talk.speaker: Nah
recruit-talk.line: After you...

end.speaker: Nah
end.line: Thank you so much. If you hadn't have come, I'd have been an adorable smear on the wall by now...

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Can you make it home on your own?

end.speaker: Nah
end.line: I... I don't have a home. Not anymore.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Then I'll arrange one for you in Ylisse.

end.speaker: Nah
end.line: No, my place is here with you now. I'm strong enough to fight, you know.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Well, seeing as you're a manakete, I certainly don't doubt that... Look, if you're sure this is what you want, then we'd love to have you.

end.speaker: Nah
end.line: I'm sure. And thank you. You won't regret it.

end.speaker: Nah
end.line: Can I ask you something, Nowi? Does this look familiar?

end.speaker: Nowi
end.line: Whoa, you have the same ring as me! What a crazy coincidence!

end.speaker: Nah
end.line: It's not a coincidence. This is your ring. It's a memento of my mother. From... the future. It keeps me safe, now that... Now that you're gone.

end.speaker: Nowi
end.line: Nah...

end.speaker: Nah
end.line: No, I'm serious. It does.

end.speaker: Nowi
end.line: Huh? Oh, hee hee! You did it to yourself that time! But no, I think it's very sweet. And now that you're with me, you don't have to hold back.

end.speaker: Nah
end.line: I wasn't holding back. I fought as hard as I could...

end.speaker: Nowi
end.line: No, you fought brilliantly, Nah. But that's not what I meant. I was talking about your tears. If you're sad, you can talk to me.

end.speaker: Nah
end.line: No, I... I have to be strong. Everyone expects me to. I can turn into a dragon, you know? And that's not... normal. So I have to put on a brave face and protect everyone, just like you do.

end.speaker: Nowi
end.line: Your mother cries all the time, dear. ...Aaaaaall the time. Trust me on this—holding things back won't make you stronger. Just be you, Nah. That's enough.

end.speaker: Nah
end.line: I... This whole time, I...

end.speaker: Nowi
end.line: I know it's been pretty scary, but you made it through!

end.speaker: Nah
end.line: *Sniff* Mother, I... Oh, it was awful... I thought I was going to DIE... *Sob* Waaaaaah!

end.speaker: Nowi
end.line: *Sniff* It... it's okay, Nah. Mother's here, now.
